title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Outdoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities              Outdoor Activities       Ranger- Led Programs   Ranger-led walks and talks which explore the life of young Jimmy Carter on the Boyhood Farm are offered as staffing and weather allow. The walks and talks are given on Saturdays and Sundays at 11:30am and 3:30pm. Please check with the visitor center desk for any possible changes in this schedule.   Ranger-led programs also include two demonstrations of life on the Boyhood Farm. The Blacksmithing demonstration is held on Saturdays from 1:30pm to 3:30pm and a Peanut Boiling demonstration is held on Sundays from 1:30pm to 3:30pm. These demonstrations are also subject to staffing and weather concerns.
